long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HelloDexter Chrome Extension is your ultimate tool for seamless lead management directly in LinkedIn. 

Enrich your contact data effortlessly by adding email addresses and phone numbers, extract multiple leads from a page with a single click, and send personalized emails using AI - all without leaving LinkedIn. 

Enhance your sales workflow and boost productivity while saving all your valuable leads directly to HelloDexter. 

Transform your LinkedIn experience and supercharge your connections today!
